alert.note: Alert for Cowley; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 1:58AM CDT until September 19 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cowley County in south central Kansas... Northeastern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oxford, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Wellington, Mulvane, Belle Plaine, Oxford, Geuda Springs, Riverdale, Wellington Airport, and Strother Field Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 15 and 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
